name: Concerted Efforts
tooltip:
Concerted EffortsLevel 60

Ah, <name>.  I hope you continue to lend your experience to the different battlefronts.  A lot of our lads and lasses in the field look up to seasoned veterans like you.

Requirements:
- Alterac Valley Mark of Honor x 3
- Arathi Basin Mark of Honor x 3
- Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor x 3
